    import numpy as np
    import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
    from wavespectra import read_era5


    dset = read_era5("../_static/era5file.nc").isel(time=0)
    p = dset.spec.plot(
            col="lon",
            row="lat",
            figsize=(16,8),
            add_colorbar=False,
            show_theta_labels=False,
            show_radii_labels=True,
            radii_ticks=[0.05, 0.1, 0.2, 0.4],
            rmax=0.4,
            radii_labels_size=5,
            cmap="Spectral_r",
    )
    plt.tight_layout()
